results.content: While this is a relatively good introduction to full stack developing there is a lot of copy-pasting involved. The teacher also doesn't explain very well the concepts other than "this is how it's done". I gave it a 3 stars grade because it was helpful but if you're a beginner you might have problems following everything that's happening.

results.content: There is very basic information provided in all the slides that you put on. I was expecting bit more details information on Python specially since this is a Python Django Web Developer course.

results.content: Good with a fast paste showing you everything to get you started with django, html and css. The only thing missing to make it a really complete course is deployment. Preferably to a webserver, secondly github.
